text: Stephen Clancy (born 19 July 1992) is an Irish professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . Clancy joined in 2013, and like all of the team's riders, he has been diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes. He resides in Girona. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Limerick (city)
title: Stephen Clancy
